column2: SES - Document Verification - New Document Verification Notification
This is the email that gets sent to the admin when a member submit new document for verification.
[sender_title] has submitted a document for verification.

[header]

[sender_title] has submitted a document for verification. Go to admin panel to verify the document.

[footer]
This is the email that gets sent to users when their documents are verified.

[header]

Congratulations, your document has been verified. Go to your setting to manage your document.

[footer]
This is the email that gets sent to users when their documents are rejected.

[header]

We are sorry to reject your document this time. Go to your setting to manage your document.

[footer]
When I receive notification for new document uploaded for verification.
